original_text: So I went in and I looked. I saw pictures of many things on the walls all around. There were pictures of snakes and other disgusting animals. There were also images of the things that Israel's people were worshipping. 11 70 of Israel's leaders were there. Shaphan's son Jaazaniah, was also among them. Each of them held a pot to burn incense. The smell of the incense rose up above them.
korean_text: 내가 들어가 보니 각양 곤충과 가증한 짐승과 이스라엘 족속의 모든 우상을 그 사방 벽에 그렸고

sentences.original_text: So I went in and I looked.
I saw pictures of many things on the walls all around.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 사방 벽에 많은 것들의 그림을 보았다.

sentences.original_text: There were pictures of snakes and other disgusting animals.
sentences.korean_translation: 뱀과 다른 역겨운 동물들의 그림이 있었다.

sentences.original_text: There were also images of the things that Israel's people were worshipping.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성들이 숭배하던 것들의 형상도 있었다.

sentences.original_text: Shaphan's son Jaazaniah, was also among them.
sentences.korean_translation: 사반의 아들 아사냐도 그들 중에 있었다.

sentences.original_text: Each of them held a pot to burn incense.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 각자는 향을 피우기 위한 화로를 들고 있었다.

sentences.original_text: The smell of the incense rose up above them.
